subject: [Agents] Add shared security policy service for effective config + warnings
description:
Intent:
- Centralize env-driven security posture computation for API, plugin warnings, and CP Security tab.

Assumptions:
- Existing ApiController security logic is source-of-truth behavior.

Design + invariants:
- No behavior changes to auth/rate-limit enforcement.
- Service emits safe redacted data for CP consumption.

Diff plan:
- src/services/SecurityPolicyService.php (new)
- src/Plugin.php service registration
- src/controllers/ApiController.php integration
- src/Plugin.php warning integration

Verification:
- Effective values match previous runtime behavior for key env combinations.
